mapper.insert: insert into CC_EARLY_WARNING (ID, VER, TS, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, LAST_MODI_DT, LAST_MODI_USER_ID, STATUS, LK_WF_INST_ID, CODE, `NAME`, FAST_CODE, AD_USER_IDS) values (#{ccEarlyWarning.id}, #{ccEarlyWarning.ver}, #{ccEarlyWarning.ts}, #{ccEarlyWarning.crtDt}, #{ccEarlyWarning.crtUserId}, #{ccEarlyWarning.lastModiDt}, #{ccEarlyWarning.lastModiUserId}, #{ccEarlyWarning.status}, #{ccEarlyWarning.lkWfInstId}, #{ccEarlyWarning.code}, #{ccEarlyWarning.name}, #{ccEarlyWarning.fastCode}, #{ccEarlyWarning.adUserIds})
